explains: n. 零食，点心，小吃；快餐；<澳，非正式>易办到的事，小菜一碟
wordGroup: snack food 小吃；零食；快餐食品
snack bar 小吃店；快餐柜

sentences.en: Lunch was a snack in the fields.
sentences.cn: 午饭是在野外吃的快餐。

sentences.en: I only have time for a snack at lunchtime.
sentences.cn: 中午，我的时间只够吃点心。

sentences.en: It is customary to offer a drink or a snack to guests.
sentences.cn: 通常用饮料或小吃招待客人。
